attributes.action: Parliament to Vote to decide to implement article 50 within 28 days of that vote
attributes.additional_details: It is our view that this matter must be decided immediately in order to restore confidence in and to avoid serious and immediate injury to our economy, to protect short and medium term growth and to protect investment in UK services and industry.
attributes.background: We the undersigned request that a vote is held in the House of Commons to decide whether or not to trigger article 50 of the Lisbon treaty within 28 days of that vote or to reject implementation absolutely.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
